name: Objectives
description: A Temple is a place shaped around reverence, obedience, and offerings, whether its gods are present, distant, or dead. Even in ruin, its layout pulls you toward altars, icons, and ritual spaces, and the stones remember every prayer, sacrifice, and betrayal performed in their shadow.

tableData.result: Secure the relic before the priests
Profane the altar with forbidden blood
Steal the temple's memory of you
Awaken whatever sleeps beneath the crypt
Bargain with the mute stone idols
Silence the hymn that never ends
Expose the high priest's hidden corpse
Replace the god's image with your own
Seal the gate beneath the sacred font
Smuggle a heretic into the inner sanctum
Smother the last ember of sacred fire
Recover the tongue cut from prophecy
Bind the wandering spirit of the sanctuary
Decode the fresco before dawn sacrifice
Let the chained oracle finally speak
Turn pilgrims away with whispered terror
Defend the sanctuary from its chosen god
Plant a false scripture in the archives
Lure the abbot into the forbidden nave
Drink from every unmarked ritual basin
Unmask the disguised execution as coronation
Guide the lost child to the black altar
Bleed on each threshold to claim passage
Restore the shattered idol with living flesh
Carry the dying bellringer to the steeple
Harvest tears from kneeling penitents unnoticed
Extinguish every candle before prayer ends
Uncover the room that appears during vespers
Turn the confession booth into a trap
Deliver a curse as a holy blessing
Trade your name for sanctuary's protection
Lead the procession into the buried wing
Feed the ravenous offering pit at midnight
Erase your sin from the ledger
Expose the skeleton bricked inside the pulpit
Poison the incense that clouds the choir
Guide the blind idol's hand toward truth
Guard the reliquary from its own relic
Catch the escaping halo in an iron cage
Interrupt the sacrifice without spilling blood
Invite the dead congregation back to pews
Hide a weapon beneath the communion rail
Translate the hymn that peels skin
Consecrate a stranger as unwilling martyr
Return the stolen vow to its owner
Drag a lurking demon into the baptistry
Test every priest for hollow bones
Follow the echo of an unsaid prayer
ACTION + THEME
ROLL TWICE

name: Atmosphere
description: A Temple is a place shaped around reverence, obedience, and offerings, whether its gods are present, distant, or dead. Even in ruin, its layout pulls you toward altars, icons, and ritual spaces, and the stones remember every prayer, sacrifice, and betrayal performed in their shadow.

tableData.result: Incense hangs like suffocating ghost
Whispers drip from sweating stone
Candles gutter against unseen breath
Shadows kneel before empty altar
Stained glass bleeds colorless light
Floor slick with old, black blessings
Air thick with forgotten vows
Columns lean, listening for confessions
Statues exhale dust and disapproval
Choir loft hums without voices
Distant chanting from nowhere, everywhere
Echoes lag, answering a different question
Cold drafts carry metallic prayers
Ceiling frescoes watch with peeling eyes
Bell rope sways without ringing
Ash snowfalls over worn pews
Steps worn concave by desperate knees
Gold leaf curls like burnt skin
Altar cloth damp with imagined blood
Smell of myrrh, mold, and fear
Unseen congregation shifts in the dark
Hallway arches like clasped, bony fingers
Every footprint sounds like a trespass
Rotted offerings buzz with patient flies
Chill settles heavier near icons
Light arrives late, leaves too early
Rain prays softly through broken roof
Choir stalls arranged like judgment seats
Censer chains clink to absent rhythm
Sanctum silence thunders in the skull
Marble floor veined like trapped lightning
Shadows flicker opposite the flames
Walls breathe in unison with you
Sacrificial pit yawns, never satisfied
Painted saints avert their flaking faces
Every door opens toward the altar
Dust motes orbit unseen presences
Tithing box rattles without being touched
Gargoyles drip rain and old sins
Faint organ notes from dead pipes
Smear of soot outlines missing relic
Fresco halos darken like bruised fruit
Pillars etched deep with fingernail prayers
Floor mosaics shuffle when unobserved
Moonlight carves the nave like silver
Air tastes of charred petitions
Vaulted ceiling presses hope downward
Silence breaks only to listen back
ACTION + THEME
ROLL TWICE
